section.title: Description
section.p: Changes the definition of a text search template.

body.codeblock: ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE name RENAME TO new_name ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE name SET SCHEMA new_schema

section.title: Description
section.p: ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE changes the definition of a text search parser. Currently, the only supported functionality is to change the parser's name.
You must be a superuser to use ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE.

plentry.pd: The name (optionally schema-qualified) of an existing text search template.
The new name of the text search template.
The new schema for the text search template.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: There is no ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE statement in the SQL standard.
